<noinclude>
== FAQPage ==
Adds schema.org FAQPage JSON-LD structured data for FAQ content.

'''Usage:''' <code><nowiki>{{FAQPage|description=Frequently asked questions about DreamFactory architecture}}</nowiki></code>

'''Parameters:'''
* '''description''' â€” A short description of the FAQ topic
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#tag:script|
<nowiki>{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "FAQPage",
  "name": "{{PAGENAME}}",
  "description": "{{{description|Frequently asked questions about {{PAGENAME}}}}}",
  "url": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com/{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}",
  "publisher": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "DreamFactory Software",
    "url": "https://www.dreamfactory.com"
  },
  "inLanguage": "en"
}</nowiki>|type=application/ld+json}}</includeonly>
